queries.description: Types that are unused with limited visibility are unnecessary and should either be removed or may indicate a developer mistake.
queries.name: Types with limited visibility should be used at least once

implementation_scope.description: CodeQL extractor information for hidden friends is limited, and the number of hidden friends may be overestimated, resulting in false positives.

RULE-0-2-3.title: Types with limited visibility should be used at least once
